name: Mighty No. 9
description: Mighty No. 9 is a 2D Side-scrolling Action game that takes the best elements from 8 and 16-bit classics that you know and love and transforms them with modern tech, fresh mechanics, and fan input into something fresh and amazing!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit or newer Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad @ 2.8 GHz or AMD Phenom X4 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 7770 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Phenom II X6 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 7950 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 Ti Storage: 2 GB available space
